meanings.definition: A crustacean of the order Decapoda, typically having ten legs and a hard shell.
meanings.sent1: The decapod scuttled along the ocean floor searching for food.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the decapod to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The decapod invited all its friends to a shellfish party.
meanings.sent4: In the underwater kingdom, the decapod ruled as the armored monarch.
meanings.sent5: Children at the aquarium were amazed by the colorful decapod.

meanings.sent1: The decapod creature moved gracefully with its ten legs.
meanings.sent2: The decapod spider skittered across the forest floor.
meanings.sent3: The decapod robot danced with precision at the science fair.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took flight, picturing a decapod spaceship soaring through the galaxy.
meanings.sent5: The decapod starfish clung to the rock with its numerous legs.
